授業方法:
Various methods including, pair and group work, listening exercises, dialog construction and presentation.
Each class will consist of various speaking and listening skills, pair work and group activities. Creating and writing theme-based dialogs and presenting them will also be included.

第1回: Welcome back, summer holiday interview chart, questioning for more details
第2回: personal news reports, text: pair work information gap activity, What is the word? small group activity
第3回: Text: situational dialog construction and presentation, Thinking Out Loud - with a partner
第4回: personal news reports, Iceland: reading comprehension drills
第5回: short essay writing - topics to be announced, listening comprehension activity
第6回: personal news reports, pair work information gap activity, giving and receiving directions
第7回: Collecting data - pair work activity, listening comprehension drills, offering solutions to problems
第8回: pair work information gap activity, Find Someone Who...?  homework: topic assignment
第9回: short speeches - homework topic, world map - what is famous in .... (country)
第10回: personal news reports, What is one reason why ...?  making appointments, business and pleasure
第11回: listening comprehension drills, reading comprehension drills, writing: paragraph construction
第12回: personal news reports, situational dialog writing and presentations
第13回: language game, course review, exam explanation, question and answer session
トピック.授業外学習2: Students would be advised to do as much personal study outside the classroom as possible.  Also, to submit any homework assignments on time.
